span.style: font-family: Playfair Display; font-size: 36px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: These resources are for all students in case parents wish to supplement what the teachers may have provided.
If you have a child with an IEP, please feel free to use the online resources that meet their academic learning level.
